Description: Welcome back to the Dungeons[;] dearie!|We've got a lot of new stuff!
Rules Description: Start with standard rules.|Gain bonus rules as you descend further.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Wide Sword~[;] ~Equipment:Jammed Cannon~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Longspear~[;] ~Upgrade~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);

Description: With the rise of the full moon[;] every single|monster in the dungeon becomes a vampire!
Rules Description: All enemies are [curse]vampires and recover [heart]2 per attack.|Enemies have 25% less health.|Your [yellow]Stake[] countdown scales with your dice count.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Wide Sword~[;] ~Equipment:Jammed Cannon~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Longspear~[;] ~Upgrade~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);

Description: Some of the dungeon floors are under renovation.|Make the most out of the ones left!
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: var arr = Rules.substitutions.get(~mqabridged_leveluprewards~).split(~|~); Rules.substitutions.remove(~mqabridged_leveluprewards~); leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~[;] arr[;] 2); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Wide Sword~[;] ~Equipment:Jammed Cannon~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Longspear~[;] ~Upgrade~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);

Description: Nothing says about the power of a warrior|like the size of their weapon!
Rules Description: You can only find large equipment.|Gain [shield]3 shield for each unused equipment after each turn.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Wide Sword~[;] ~Equipment:Jammed Cannon~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Longspear~[;] ~Upgrade~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);
Script: End Turn: var shield = 0; for (eq in self.equipment) if (eq.skillcard == ~~ && !eq.hastag(~skillcard~) && eq.ready) shield += 3; if (shield > 0) {inflictself(SHIELD[;] shield); sfx(~_shield~);}

Description: What if everything was a boomerang?
Rules Description: Everytime you do damage[;] half of it is also done to you.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Wide Sword~[;] ~Equipment:Jammed Cannon~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Longspear~[;] ~Upgrade~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);

Description: Every dice you roll is a six! That's some insane luck!
Rules Description: At the start of your turn[;] your dice always roll 6.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Wide Sword~[;] ~Equipment:Jammed Cannon~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Longspear~[;] ~Upgrade~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);

Description: Come back in a later build!
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Poison Needle~[;]~Equipment:Crowbar~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Skeleton Key~[;] ~Equipment:Hacksaw~[;] ~Upgrade~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);

Description: Come back in a later build!
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~CPU:2~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Buster Sword~[;]~Equipment:Ultima Weapon~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~CPU:2~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Heat Sink~[;] ~Equipment:Increment~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~CPU:2~);

Description: Come back in a later build!
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Flamethrower~[;]~Equipment:Doppeldice~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Upgrade~[;]~Equipment:Scrap Metal~[;]~Copy~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);

Description: Come back in a later build!
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~~[;] [~Spell:Burning Light~[;]~Spell:Electric Shock~[;] ~Spell:Ice Shard~[;] ~Spell:Sonic Wave~]| 2); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~WitchUpgrade~[;]~WitchPrecast~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~~[;] [~Spell:Doppeldice~[;]  ~Spell:Duplicate~]); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~WitchUpgrade~[;] ~ExtraDice~[;] ~WitchPrecast~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~~[;] [~WitchUpgrade~[;] ~WitchPrecast~]);

Description: Come back in a later build!
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~~[;] loadtext(~diceydungeons/jesterpacks/packs_normal~)[;] 2); leveluprewards(3[;] ~Equipment:Duplicate~); leveluprewards(4[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Call for Backup Warrior~[;]~Equipment:Call for Backup Witch~[;]~Equipment:Call for Backup Inventor~][;] 2); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Call for Backup Thief~[;]~Equipment:Call for Backup Robot~[;] ~Delete~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Equipment:Duplicate~);
